mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ObBasePriceXD ( basePriceID, rowNo, project, netWeight, grossWeight, lossWeight, materialPrice, materialCost, productionCost, price, remark, creatorID, creatorName, createDate ) VALUES ( #{basePriceID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=DATE}, #{netWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grossWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lossWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate() )
